parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates new items and stores them in the given container. Works with items, weapons and magazines.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> box '''addItemCargoGlobal''' [item, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> box: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [item, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>supplyBox [[addItemCargoGlobal]] ["optic_Arco", 10];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addItemCargo]], [[clearItemCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Command is executed on all connected clients in multiplayer.
</value></part></template></root>
